segments.text: The garden outside the window looks so peaceful and well-kept.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a beautiful day outside, with the sunlight streaming in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see a path with low bushes and plants on both sides.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The fence at the back adds a nice touch to the scenery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a contrast to the chaos happening inside the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could be out there, enjoying the calm and the sunshine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen is such a mess with the water overflowing and the kids climbing everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm glad the garden is doing well, at least.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a lovely view, and it makes me feel a bit better about the situation inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think I'll focus on the garden instead of the chaos in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR
